AboutAbout is a preposition or an adverb. …
About as a prepositionThe most common meaning of about as a preposition is ‘on the subject of’ or ‘connected with’: …
About as an adverbWe use about as an adverb when we talk about time, number and quantity. About makes the time, number or quantity less specific and more approximate: …
Be about toWe use the modal expression be about to as an adjective in the modal expression be about to to refer to something that will happen very soon in the future: …
